## DynamicFormBuilder.bind() method

Constructs selectors for TForm and TState that resolve to reactive observables. Used to bind options to form or state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bind<TFormSlice extends string, TStateSlice extends keyof TInputState, TReturnValue>(formSlice: ValidFormSlice<DeepRequired<TForm>, TFormSlice>[], stateSlice: TStateSlice[], setter: FormStateSelectorFn<DeepPropsObject<ConstructSliceFromPath<TFormSlice, TForm>, TFormSlice>, Partial<PickOr<TInputState, TStateSlice, never>>, TReturnValue>, onlyOnce?: boolean): FormStateSelector<ConstructSliceFromPath<TFormSlice, TForm>, PickOr<TInputState, TStateSlice, never>, TReturnValue, string, TStateSlice>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  formSlice | [ValidFormSlice](./dynamic-forms.validformslice.md)<!-- -->&lt;DeepRequired&lt;TForm&gt;, TFormSlice&gt;\[\] |  |
|  stateSlice | TStateSlice\[\] |  |
|  setter | [FormStateSelectorFn](./dynamic-forms.formstateselectorfn.md)<!-- -->&lt;DeepPropsObject&lt;ConstructSliceFromPath&lt;TFormSlice, TForm&gt;, TFormSlice&gt;, Partial&lt;PickOr&lt;TInputState, TStateSlice, never&gt;&gt;, TReturnValue&gt; |  |
|  onlyOnce | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

[FormStateSelector](./dynamic-forms.formstateselector.md)<!-- -->&lt;ConstructSliceFromPath&lt;TFormSlice, TForm&gt;, PickOr&lt;TInputState, TStateSlice, never&gt;, TReturnValue, string, TStateSlice&gt;
